tool_description: All in one api where you can get everything that mobile app use for it’s work
name: TikTok
title: TikTok

api_list.name: Discover
api_list.description:
Get list of trending videos with specific hashtag for region(country).
This is "Discover" screen in the mobile app.

api_list.name: Search suggestion
api_list.description:
Get suggestion for search query.
Suggestion from TikTok for search.

api_list.name: Hashtag(challenge) search
api_list.description:
Get hashtags(challenges) by query string.
This is "Hashtags" tab in the mobile app search page

api_list.name: Live search
api_list.description:
Get ongoing lives by query string.
This is "Live" tab in the mobile app search page.
You can find direct video url in result.

api_list.name: Trending
api_list.description: You can GET Feed(Trending) videos like you get in first screen of the app for any region(country) you want.
